QuestData.Title: Boar Training: Cruel Ogres
QuestData.Description: Nagrand is home to the mightiest beasts in Draenor, and the ogres of the region have learned to tame them using brutal techniques.$B$BThere is one ogre in particular, the Gorian Beast-Lasher, that smells of blood and fear. Go on and see how your beast reacts to that.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat the Gorian Beast-Lasher while riding your Boar-In-Training.
